Text.content:
If you hover over a resource, you get several options for it. You can:

  • Preview the content
  • Get context menu options as in the other (gallery) dialogs
  • If you view the selection My changes, you can check Remove. Doing so, the resource can not be published in this selection anymore and when publishing the next time, the resource will not appear under My changes anymore.
